mapper.select: SELECT data, last_update FROM cafeteria WHERE `key` = #{key}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cafeteria (`key`, data, last_update) VALUES (#{key}, #{value}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE data = #{value}, last_update = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
INSERT INTO metadata (`key`, data) VALUES (#{key}, #{value}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE data = #{value}
